document.full_text: the legal challenge to the new wisconsin law that curbs the union rights of public workers moved forward on wednesday with the filing of a formal complaint against the republican lawmakers who steered the bill through the legislature.
document.title: legal challenge filed against wisconsin's anti-union law
lines_and_colors: the legal challenge to the new wisconsin law that curbs the union rights of public workers moved forward on wednesday with the filing of a formal complaint against the republican lawmakers who steered the bill through the legislature.
